title: Software Developer I
description:
Under direct supervision, analyze, design, develop, implement, test, maintain, and support software applications or specialized computer programs, and enhancements of existing systems for client projects.

Assist in all phases of software development life-cycle (SDLC). Collaborate with other software engineers/developers to gather and analyze user and business requirements, document specifications, and develop software solutions to meet client needs and data.

Analyze user needs and develop solutions for project requirements. Create appropriate software documentation. Support and troubleshoot software as required, including testing / quality assurance, debugging and modifying applications to enhance user friendliness.

Demonstrate knowledge in development methodologies, software design patterns, and software engineering best practices for the application of development domain areas and specific technologies and tool sets.
location: Position may telecommute from anywhere in the U.S
requirements: This position requires a Bachelor's degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technology, Information Systems, or a related field. 40hrs/week
instructions:
To apply, please MAIL resume to the following address, ensuring to indicate the position reference code (Ref#SDI927SB) for which you are applying.
Mail to: Diyo Technologies LLC, Attn: P. Sapkota, HR, 11260 Roger Bacon Drive, Suite 205, Reston, VA 20190
